projects.heading: Keyboard
projects.text: This innovative keyboard project seamlessly integrates physical keystrokes with real-time desktop visualization, enhancing user experience and productivity.

projects.heading: Calculator
projects.text: My inaugural JavaScript task posed a challenge, yet triumphantly, I succeeded. A project focused on crafting a calculator, showcasing my burgeoning skills in JavaScript development.

projects.heading: Netflix Page
projects.text: After successfully creating the Sweet Treats Bakery, replicating a Netflix page was a breeze. This project, meticulously crafted using CSS and HTML, mirrors the allure of the popular streaming platform.

projects.heading: Supreme Athlete
projects.text: The website, designed to emulate a social media platform, showcases a comprehensive integration of all modules covered throughout the course, offering a dynamic and immersive user experience.

projects.heading: Le Petit Italia
projects.text: Join me as I lead a collaborative effort to craft a captivating website for an Italian restaurant, blending passion and teamwork to bring the flavors of Italy to life online.

projects.heading: To Do List
projects.text: I crafted a sleek and efficient to-do list using the power of JavaScript and CSS, simplifying task management with style.

testimonials.heading: Naeema Omar(Colleague)
testimonials.text: Zubaidah is an optimistic and self-motivated person who always puts in her best.She handles every task given to her with steadfast consistency.

testimonials.heading: Ntokozo Sithebe(Colleague)
testimonials.text: Zubaidah Isaacs is a very intelligent and creative young lady.Her enthusiam to learn in general is great and inspiring .She has the ability to shine where ever she is.

testimonials.heading: Tyhiesha Johnson(Colleague)
testimonials.text: Zubaidah Isaacs exemplifies a strong work ethic that extends into her personal life. As a versatile individual, she adeptly balances leadership and teamwork, generously supporting colleagues with infectious positive energy.

testimonials.heading: S'phathimandla Makhanya(Colleague)
testimonials.text: Zubaidah, an energetic and positive young lady, is dedicated to her work, making her a great asset. Her friendly and welcoming demeanor enhances communication, creating a pleasant work environment.

testimonials.heading: Matthew Brown(Lecturer)
testimonials.text: Zubaidah is an outstanding student, demonstrating exceptional dedication to academic excellence. Her insightful contributions enriched class discussions and inspired peers to strive for excellence.

testimonials.heading: Seth Tobias(Colleague)
testimonials.text: Zubaidah is someone you would want to be acquainted with given her bright and cheerful personality.She is passionate about her work and all together a genuine human being.

resume.heading: Manenberg High School
resume.text: I graduated from Manenberg High School in 2020, where I proudly served as the valedictorian of my graduating class. This experience ignited a profound realization of my leadership potential and allowed me to hone my skills in guiding others.

resume.heading: LC Studio
resume.text: As an intern at this esteemed facility, I am dedicated to honing my skills and expertise in preparation for the professional workspace.

resume.heading: Life Choices Coding Academy
resume.text: Once again, I ventured beyond my comfort zone to explore a new facet of my workâ€”coding, a realm I initially knew little about. Despite initial nervousness, my curiosity prevailed, and now, thriving in this new skill, I proudly acknowledge my successful journey. This experience has taught me to tap into my inner confidence, master public speaking, and appreciate the profound impact of words in shaping outcomes.

resume.heading: YearBeyond Programme
resume.text: This marked my inaugural job post-graduation, and I approached it with enthusiasm and a strong work ethic, contributing significantly to my skill development. Tutoring fourth-grade children was particularly rewarding, as it not only involved teaching but also establishing meaningful connections with them. Through this experience, I gained valuable lessons in resilience, patience, gratitude, and discipline.

resume.heading: NQFL4 Nature Conservation Learnership with Quemic Africa
resume.text: Transitioning from a confined space to an open environment was a unique experience. I encountered diverse animals, learned about the roles of plants and animals, and conquered my fear of snakes, realizing their harmlessness. This journey fostered my confidence, ownership, and leadership skills.

resume.heading: Technical Skills
resume.text: HTML.  CSS.  Bootstrap.  Javascript.  Vue Js. MySql . Node Js.
